name: scarlet
author: Australian Armed Forces <omega@sinn.io>
description: Scarlet is a mod updater for the Australian Armed Forces

scripts.build: npm run build:agent:release && npm run build:electron
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.release:mac: npm run build && electron-builder build --mac --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.release:win: npm run build && electron-builder build --win --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.release: npm run build && electron-builder build --mac --win --config electron-builder.yml
